chapters.title: Chapter 8: That Smoldering City
chapters.info: Melfane Dawlish, p. 204—Short, ample-cheeked niece of Essande and dispenser of herbs and ointments. She ran a shop on Candle Street in New Caemlyn. She is a midwife, and is now Elayne's midwife. She is very insistent that Elayne follow her instructions precisely, no exceptions. Against all expectations, she has found some goats' milk to force down Elayne's throat despite the invasion of Caemlyn.
